content: my sister megan is a teacher and she inspired this hat while she helps children learn my hopes are that this hat will help knitters to do colourwork the pattern design is a simple 4 stitch repeat that staggers as the hat is knit up it gives the knitting the opportunity to practice catching floats and to do stranded knitting while using both hands sizing this hat will fit up to a 23 circumference yarn this pattern calls for a worsted weight yarn i used malabrigo rios in purpuras for the main colour and valentina for the contrast colour gauge 18 sts / 4 needles 4 00mm and 5 00mm needles on a 16 cord 5 00 dpn or needles and 40 cord for magic loop additional materials - stitch marker - scissors - darning needle if you ve never tried colourwork give it a shot hope you like the pattern
